Dear Origa Hiring Team,

I am writing to express my strong interest in the Frontend Engineer position at Origa. With over 5 years of experience, I offer a robust background in developing responsive, performant, and accessible web interfaces.

My expertise aligns perfectly with your requirements, showcasing proficiency in **HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6+), and React.js**. I am skilled in state management using **Redux** and have a strong track record of integrating frontends with both **RESTful and GraphQL APIs**. My experience includes translating design mockups into functional components, optimizing applications for speed, and maintaining high code quality through clean coding practices and code reviews.

I am eager to bring my frontend development and architectural skills to Origa.

Sincerely,
Praful Gaur
